title: Generate FERC Compliance Report
description: A compliance officer needs to generate a quarterly report for the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) detailing all physical and financial energy trades.

tasks.description: Query the ETRM system to pull all trade data for the last quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a complete list of all trades.

tasks.description: Format the trade data according to FERC's specific reporting requirements (e.g., Electric Quarterly Report - EQR).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly formats the data into the required structure.

tasks.description: Generate the final report and prepare it for submission to FERC.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the completed EQR file.
